title: Getting married
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Marriage

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Conduct of life
description: Explores the whole problem of marrying young. Linda and Rodger aged 16 and 20 respectively, discuss their marriage plans with the vicar and their parents. Other couples who have married in their teens, talk about their attitude to sex before marriage and to contraception.
